scene_description_enriched: A figure, likely a woman, is depicted in profile, looking upwards with hands clasped in prayer. She wears a draped garment and a headdress. To her left, a scroll or banner with illegible text curves into the frame. To her right, architectural elements suggest an interior space, with a column and part of an arch visible. The background is filled with a stippled pattern, possibly representing a starry sky or decorative motif.
